title.narrative: Supporting the industrial sector for sustainable livelihoods in the Syrian Arab Republic

description.narrative: The project aims at maintaining and improving industrial vocational and technical trainings across Syria as a tool to accelerate the re-establishment of sustainable livelihoods among local communities. The project will (i) support the refurbishing of selected training departments of Syrian Vocational Training centers; (ii) train vocational and technical instructors; (iii) support micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs) by proving access for technical training for their workers; and (iv) introduce STEM curricula at primary schools located among some of the communities most affected by the conflict. This project will be implemented within the framework of a partnership project titled #Building human capacity for the future generations in Syria# output 4: economic governance and capacity of the productive sectors enhanced. The project is also in line with the 2018 Humanitarian Response Plan - Early Recovery and Livelihoods sector strategy and its defining humanitarian principles. The project is also aligned with the interventions under the UNSF 2016-2019 Focus Area 3 #improving socio-economic resilience of the Syrian people# - outcome 3 #households and communities benefit from sustainable livelihoods opportunities, including economic recovery and social inclusion# and its output 3.1 #Income, sustainab
